article_title: The Seven Most Memorable Healthcare Books of 2014, Part Two

article_metadata.author: Leah Binder

og.description: This is Part Two of my list of the seven most memorable healthcare books of the year. I began Part One with three books that confront the difficulty of patient death. Today, I look at the three most unforgettable books on politics and money in healthcare. And on December 31: [...]
